messages: Why in the winter do we try to keep the house as warm as it was in the summer, when we complained about the heat?
Why in the winter do we try to keep the house as warm as it was in the summer, when we complained about the heat?
RT @Bri_Ivette: "Because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you." Psalm 63:3
